roleset.name: to make an attack, criticize strongly

roles.note: Noun roleset has both "instrument" and "attribute," where verb frame has only attribute because of gaming usages where game piece is "attacker."

example.name: Args 1, 2, MNR
example.text: As early as move six , Mr. Kasparov deviated from a well-known sequence of moves , developing a knight instead of making a standard bishop attack against the computer 's advanced knight .

example.name: NP only, Args 0 & 1
example.text: their attacks on program trading and its contributions to the stock market 's wild price swings
example.arg: on program trading and its contributions to the stock market 's wild price swings

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb entry attack.01, OntoNotes grouping attack-n senses 1-9; maps to VN class judgement-33. Framed by Claire.

example.name: MNR and Arg0
example.text: The president came under sharp attack from members of Congress for his foreign policy.
example.note: "for his foreign policy" will likely be a sister of the verb, acting as causal argument, rather than an argument of the eventive noun.

example.name: Arg 0 only in "by" PP
example.text: Small pets are subject to attack by these roaming nocturnal predators.

example.name: Metaphorical attack, illness
example.text: The new medication has reduced Sally's asthma attacks.

example.name: Metaphorical attack, Arg0 only
example.text: The student froze during the beginning of her piano recital from an attack of nerves.

example.name: Arg 0 as "of" PP
example.text: The hinge was weakened by an attack of rust.

example.name: With arg 3, invented
example.text: John's attack of capitalism as the root of all evil was not well-accepted at the Republican National Convention.
example.arg: as the root of all evil
